issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: TestDFSIO -read -random doesn't work on file sized 4GB

comments.body: [~zhoutai.zt], Attached patch to address the issue. Tested it locally with 5Gb file for random reads.

Thanks [~ajayydv].
The second patch looks good to me, +1.
+1 on v002 patch, the license warning and the unit test failure are related. I've committed to trunk, thanks [~zhoutai.zt] for reporting this and [~ajayydv] for the contribution!
